name: Introduction to Video Games
description: The Holo-Violator, His Cyborg Familiar, Dot Gobbler, XCOM Obama, Nineties Cockpit Freakout and The Wizard. Six short games made for Wizard Jam 2015 in 16 days. Every game uses W,A,S,D,N and Space for controls. Press R to return to menu. For fullscreen press Alt and Enter.
